tags: idk what genre this is tbh
summary: Ello~ May I just say, your writing is absolutely amazing ^-^! That being said; I have a request! Iida x reader who has a quirk...
question: Ello~ May I just say, your writing is absolutely amazing ^-^! That being said; I have a request! Iida x reader who has a quirk which lets them rewind their own personal life by however much time, but it takes 3x as long to use it again (in other words, they go back three days, they can’t use it for nine days) anyway, while he’s in the hospital after his fight with Stain, he reflects on asking them to use their quirk and upset he was that they couldn’t, but they visit him and forgive him.
answer:
(A/N)- Thank you so much, Anon. It means a lot! You probably even forgot you sent this in because of how long I took to get to it. I’m sorry. Even though I’m certain this isn’t good, I hope you enjoy this.

                                                         xxx

‘(Name)! You have to go back! Please, I don’t wan’t anyone to die here,’ Iida’s squirmed, barely being able to project his voice to you in his frozen position. 

‘Hey, (Name), why aren’t you moving? Please go back and warn me! GO!’

You were petrified, and you probably broke a record for not blinking for the longest time. The thought of letting Iida down was haunting your soul, and in your mind, the thousand things that could happen to him at the moment were being put on display. You tried to move your lips but no sound came. You can’t go back. You can’t save him. You’re sorry.

A bright flash of light followed.

                                                           xxx

Iida was in the hospital. You’d checked on him a few times when he was asleep, but felt too ashamed to face him. He almost lost his life because you had foolishly used your quirk to get extra time to prepare for a test. Fearing Iida’s utter disappointment, you had chosen to ignore him for  the rest of the year- no, for the rest of your life. 

You were a bit hurt too, but the minor nature of your injuries meant you were discharged from the hospital much quicker. Before leaving the hospital, you decided to check on Iida one last time. So you moved into his room in the murk of the night and found him fast asleep. Having gazed at him for a few seconds you were ready to make your way out.

‘(Name),’ you heard Iida’s voice. Turning around, you saw his eyes were hardly open. But his voice was stern. He continued with the same coldness, ‘I didn’t know you were admitted too.’

‘Yes, well- only minor injuries,’ you said pointing to a bandage on your leg.

His gaze seemed to linger on the bandage. After a moment’s pause he said, ‘I apologise for your injury, it was my fault. But may  I ask you, why did you chose not to go back?’

Overcome by shame, you couldn’t meet his eyes. With a red face and unstable voice, you answered, ‘I’m the one who should apologise for being so useless. I had already used my quirk a day before. I couldn’t use it again.’

He paused again. You thought the look on his face changed; you weren’t sure, your diverted gaze and the gloomy night could be playing games.

‘I’m sorry, Iida. I really wanted to help. I know you are hate me but-’

‘I don’t hate you.’

‘Well, even if you are mad at me, it’s-’

‘I’m not,’ he said with certainty. ‘Even if you didn’t go back on purpose, I don’t think I could ever hate you. Or be mad at you.’

‘I don’t get it. Aren’t you angry that-’

‘It was wrong of me to put so much pressure on you. You must have felt so scared. I’m in the wrong. I’m sorry. Allow me to make up for it?’

Blushing even more than you were before, you mustered, ‘How?’

‘From now on, let’s practice together. We’ll make sure no one makes silly mistakes.’

You agreed thinking Iida was looking out for you. Little did you know, it was his way of spending more time with the person he liked.

summary:
Naomight week is coming up! From June 25th until July 1st!
What's Naomight week?
Naomight week is a week celebrating the...
body:
Naomight Week!

Naomight week is coming up! From June 25th until July 1st!

What’s Naomight week?

Naomight week is a week celebrating the relationship between Naomasa Tsukauchi and Yagi Toshinori, aka All Might!

Prompts!

Day 1; First Meeting/Pining

Day 2; Holiday/Weather

Day 3; Comfort/Home

Day 4; Family/Alternate Universe

Day 5; Pride/Freedom

Day 6; Free day

Day 7; Safety/Happy Endings

Other info!

Our two mods are @trxnstenya and @valduin111 !

We’ll be reblogging content from the start date until the end of July, so don’t worry about being late!

As an fyi, this event is anti run, and one of our mods is a minor, so we will not be reblogging any nsfw/morally wrong content. More information on this can be found in guidelines under our about!

Be sure to use the tag #naomightweek2019 so we can find your submissions!

blog.name: theenigmaofriversong
blog.title: The Long way round
blog.description: Clara sometimes asks me if I dream. Of course I dream, I tell her. Everybody dreams. But what do you dream about, she'll ask. The same thing everybody dreams about, I tell her. I dream about where I'm going. She always laughs at that. But you're not going anywhere, you're just wandering about. That's not true. Not any more. I have a new destination. My journey is the same as yours, the same as anyones. It's taken me so many years, so many lifetimes, but at last I know where I'm going. Where I've always been going. Home...

summary: I really wanna see UA have the hero course students do mock photo shoots and commercials and interviews other marketing things...
body:
I really wanna see UA have the hero course students do mock photo shoots and commercials and interviews other marketing things in conjunction with the business course.

Because, since that kind of stuff is gonna be a large part of a lot of their careers, it makes sense for them to learn how to get through that kind of thing beforehand.

summary: Inside This Place Is Warm, Outside It Starts To Pour
title: Inside This Place Is Warm, Outside It Starts To Pour
description:
by Explosive_Disaster

After a particularly bad patrol Bakugou gets home soaked from the rain, and as always, Kirishima’s there to help.

Words: 2152, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of Gay Disasters

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Kirishima Eijirou
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou
  • Additional Tags: Bakugou Katsuki Swears A Lot, But you already knew that, Aged-Up Character(s), they own a cat, she’s a lil shit, like Bakugou, but we love them anyways, Kirishima would be a great cat dad, fight me, Kissing, Boys Kissing, Movie Night, Rain, Boys In Love, Sleepy Cuddles, Cuddling & Snuggling, Fluff, Fluff and Humor, Domestic Fluff, Endgame is mentioned, yes I’m still not over it, Netflix and Chill, no seriously, they just watch netflix and chill, Romance, Minor Character(s), kaminari denki - Freeform, Jirou Kyouka - Freeform, midoriya izuku - Freeform, momo yaoyorozu - Freeform, tokoyami fumikage - Freeform, todoroki shouto - Freeform
